scripts.setupConsole: cd ../.. && cd frontend-console && yarn install && yarn build
scripts.startBackend: cd .. && python3 -m venv .venv && . .venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && ROLLUP_HTTP_SERVER_URL=http://127.0.0.1:5004 python3 echo.py > .env/echo.log 2>&1 &
scripts.prepareEnvironment: yarn generateTypes && yarn setupConsole && yarn buildImages
scripts.startEnvironment:host: cd .. && docker-compose -f ../docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.override.yml -f ../docker-compose-host.yml up -d && cd test
scripts.saveLogs: saveLogs () { mkdirp logs && docker-compose -f ../../docker-compose.yml -f ../docker-compose.override.yml logs --timestamps --no-log-prefix --no-color $1 > logs/$1.log; }; saveLogs
scripts.pretest:host: yarn prepareEnvironment && yarn startEnvironment:host && yarn startBackend
scripts.pretest:ci: yarn generateTypes && yarn setupConsole && yarn startEnvironment:prod
scripts.test: wrap () { yarn test:prod "$@" && yarn test:host "$@"; }; wrap
